document_data.name: Eryn Xeph
document_data.sex: Female<ref group="note">While the text of the adventure states Eryn is a [[human]] male, the ''Dramatis Personae'' lists her as an [[elven]] female.
document_data.Description: She had a rather slender form, with pale skin, blue eyes, and silver hair. Eryn had the distinctive characteristic of having an extremely low tolerance for physical pain.
document_data.Personality: Eryn had a fervent interest in philosophy.
document_data.Activities: Eryn desired to attain true power over the [[Prime Material plane]], and believed her best chances were to join the inner circle of Zariel's cult.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Eryn unwittingly offered herself as a sacrifice to the cult of Zariel in the [[Baldur's Gate/Sewers|sewers]] of Baldur's Gate, believing she was being accepted as a full-fledged member.{{Cite adventurers league/Hungry Shadows|15}}
